description: The system should maybe allow users to log in with some sort of secure method.
The mobile app might send notifications when it thinks something important has happened.
The website should, where possible, prevent users from making obvious mistakes during checkout.
The system may try to back up data every night if it is convenient.
The report generation feature should generally respond quickly.
The user interface shall be extremely intuitive and look modern at all times.
The dashboard must make users feel confident and happy about their financial decisions.
The system shall avoid annoying the user with too many pop-ups.
The help messages should be friendly and not too technical.
The mobile app must be beautiful and pleasant to use on all devices.
The system shall load pages fast even under heavy usage.
The API response time should be acceptable for all customers.
The server shall handle a large number of concurrent users.
The application must provide high security for user data.
The system shall rarely crash during normal operation.
The system shall authenticate the user and display the dashboard and send a welcome email after login.
The report screen shall show the chart, export to PDF, update live data, and allow admins to add new metrics.
The system shall back up the database every night and restore it automatically if anything goes wrong.
The app must track the user's location and battery usage while providing accurate recommendations.
The payment module shall calculate taxes correctly and be very fast and be easy to maintain.
The system shall send it to the user once they approve it.
If the device is disconnected, it shall notify the operator before it stops.
The application shall log all important events etc. for later analysis.
Customer information shall be stored in the Client Table while the customer data is processed in the User module.
The system shall follow the company security policy document where applicable.
The system shall store all user profiles in a single PostgreSQL database running on port 5432.
The application shall use a React front-end and a Node.js back-end for all user-facing features.
Passwords must be hashed using exactly SHA-1 and saved in a 'passwords' table.
The logistics service shall communicate with the warehouse through a daily CSV file placed in /tmp/inbox.
The system shall not allow any unauthorized or suspicious activities.
The app shall never lose important data.
The user profile page shall display all relevant information about the user.
The reporting module shall implement the KP-Alpha algorithm as described in the internal wiki.
The audit trail shall capture everything that happened in the system.
The system shall provide GDPR-compliant processing of user data (details TBD).
The notification service must retry failed messages a few times before giving up.
